name: Yıkıcı Arzu
desc: Yaşama hasret kalmış habis bir düz kılıç. Bir ejderi bile etkisiz hale getirebilecek kadar güçlü bir zehre sahip.

desc.text:
Bu çok uzun zaman öncesinden bir hikaye...
Doğmamış bir hayat, gerçekleşmemiş dilekler...
Asla gerçek olamayacak evrensel bir karanlığın kıyısındaki trajik hayaller...
Bedenimi kullanarak bu dünyaya yeniden gelin.
Sonrasında ise sevgili çocuklarım,
derelere akan yağmur suları ve güneşe doğru büyüyen bitkiler gibi
hoş bir yere gidip orada gururla güzelliğinizi sergileyin.
Bu, Durin adlı bir çocuğun annesine dair sahip olduğu bir anı...
"Teşekkürler anne, teşekkürler."
"Bana kudretli bir beden ve yükselmem için kanatlar verdin."
"Anne, içinde harika şarkıların olduğu bir diyara gitmek istiyorum."
"Onlara senden ve diğer herkesten bahsedeceğim anne."
"Onlara doğduğum yerin güzelliğini anlatacağım."

value.text: Element Becerisi Hasarını <color=#37ffff>%16/%20/%24/%28/%32</color> ve Element Becerisi Kritik Oranını <color=#37ffff>%6/%7,5/%9/%10,5/%12</color> artırır.

value.name: İltihaplı Ejder İliği
value.desc:
Specialized refinement material for Festering Desire.
This is the product of purifying Durin's vile venom, which has seeped into and spread throughout Dragonspine's ley lines. By using it on a bloodthirsty sword with a strong affinity for such materials, you can increase that sword's power.

materials.name: Karahindiba Gladyatörü Kelepçesi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
It's a human thing to exaggerate a hero's story, even to the point of elevating the fetters that once bound the hero to the level of an enemy of true freedom.
As a result, these fetters were granted extraordinary powers.

materials.name: Ağır Boynuz
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Karahindiba Gladyatörü Zinciri
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

materials.name: Ağır Boynuz
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Acemi Asker Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Karahindiba Gladyatörü Zinciri
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

materials.name: Siyah Bronz Boynuz
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Çavuş Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Karahindiba Gladyatörü Prangası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

materials.name: Siyah Bronz Boynuz
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Çavuş Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Karahindiba Gladyatörü Prangası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

materials.name: Siyah Kristal Boynuz
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Subay Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

materials.name: Karahindiba Gladyatörü Rüyası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa may have been freed from slavery, but she then found herself subject to many other, even greater forms of bondage. What began as a duty to her tribespeople extended to all of Mondstadt, then to the concept of freedom itself, and beyond a point even to the whole world.
What she really hoped for, in truth, was that the world might grow stronger.

materials.name: Siyah Kristal Boynuz
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Subay Nişanı
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.
